vsParam:

Let me see it power...

Be careful...

Er, no problem.
I'm a professional.

Uh huh, this is the blasting fuse.
And the safety device... Not seen.

Yeah.
Let's not disturb her now.

Oh, shifting the center of gravity so that the bomb is easier
to throw? OK, I need to note down this structure...

yet you can make such a splendid item.
No, I am far from being amazing.

someone compliments you. Stop playing cool!

I really envy you. Stop playing cool!

Ah, Marie!
You are still holding the bomb!

Oh no...
Boohoo, that was quite an explosion...

Nice one...
That's the bomb made by [px]...

But I think it's more than the bomb
that exploded...

That's why I reminded you like that!
I told you to be careful, did you hear me?

Marie, you must be more prudent!
You always...

O-OK... Sorry...
I... I will be more careful... Er...

Hey, [px], Sorel. I think they still need quite some time.
How about we go eat some desserts?

Ha-ha, this is a wise choice...
Good luck, Marie. We'll go first...

Boo-hoo... It reminds me of Ingrid Sensei, boo-hoo!
I hate being scolded, boo-hoo!
